channel.title: Emma Watson: Hot?
channel.description:
With the new HP movie out, I was basically drooling over her as I watched the movie. So yea, what do you guys think?
[img]http://www.sneamia.net/sr/images/ew.jpg[/img]
EDIT: Some more recent photos.
[img]http://www.sneamia.net/sr/images/ew3.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.sneamia.net/sr/images/ew4.jpg[/img]
She's one of those actresses who don't need heavy airbrushing. In the three photos above, they were all shot by fans, and there is no way they would have airbrushed the hundreds of pictures they took at each event.
Oh what? She has [url=http://www.emmawatsonofficial.com/]an official website[/url]?

item.title: Emma Watson: Hot?
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:159, topic:122700”][quote author=Hex Key link=topic=172409.msg1860592#msg1860592 date=1193972053]

dudes check her eyebrows… i bet she has the biggest muff ever, fucking exploding out her underwear. she gets a 5.5.

anal beards on girls = not cool

  • if you gonna die your hair dark blonde, dont leave your eyebrows black.
    She could shave. After all she is a lady now.

if she can’t be arsed to sort out those eyebrows, i doubt she could give a toss about her giant muff + anal beard. The more i think about it the more she deserves a flat 5.
[/quote]

I laughed my fucking ass off when I read “anal beard”, I’m pretty sure I have an anal beard/moustache/sideburn combo.

Anyways I think shes really pretty.[/quote]

Read full topic
